av.gloss: the eleventh month of the civil year

avadavat.gloss: red Asian weaverbirds often kept as cage birds

avahi laniger.gloss: nocturnal indris with thick grey-brown fur and a long tail

availability.gloss: the quality of being at hand when needed

availableness.gloss: the quality of being at hand when needed

avalanche lily.gloss: perennial herb having large white flowers marked with orange

avaram.gloss: evergreen Indian shrub with vivid yellow flowers whose bark is used in tanning

avatar.gloss: a new personification of a familiar idea

ave maria.gloss: a salutation to the Virgin Mary now used in prayers to her

avena barbata.gloss: oat of southern Europe and southwestern Asia

avena sativa.gloss: widely cultivated in temperate regions for its edible grains

avene sterilis.gloss: Mediterranean oat held to be progenitor of modern cultivated oat

aventail.gloss: a medieval hood of mail suspended from a basinet to protect the head and neck

aventurine.gloss: a translucent quartz spangled with bits of mica or other minerals

average.gloss: approximating the statistical norm or average or expected value
lacking special distinction, rank, or status
around the middle of a scale of evaluation
relating to or constituting the most frequent value in a distribution
relating to or constituting the middle value of an ordered set of values (or the average of the middle two in a set with an even number of values)

averageness.gloss: ordinariness as a consequence of being average and not outstanding

averell harriman.gloss: United States financier who negotiated a treaty with the Soviet Union banning tests of nuclear weapons (1891-1986)

averment.gloss: a declaration that is made emphatically (as if no supporting evidence were necessary)

averrhoa.gloss: trees native to East Indies having pinnate leaves: carambolas

averrhoa bilimbi.gloss: East Indian evergreen tree bearing very acid fruit

averrhoa carambola.gloss: East Indian tree bearing deeply ridged yellow-brown fruit

aversion.gloss: the act of turning yourself (or your gaze) away

averting.gloss: the act of turning yourself (or your gaze) away

avesta.gloss: a collection of Zoroastrian texts gathered during the 4th or 6th centuries

aviary.gloss: a building where birds are kept

aviation.gloss: the aggregation of a country's military aircraft

aviation medicine.gloss: the study and treatment of disorders associated with flight (especially with space flight)

avicennia.gloss: small genus of tropical shrubs or trees

avicennia marina.gloss: a mangrove of the West Indies and the southern Florida coast

avicennia officinalis.gloss: a small to medium-sized tree growing in brackish water especially along the shores of the southwestern Pacific

avicenniaceae.gloss: used in some classifications: coextensive with the genus Avicennia

avidity.gloss: a positive feeling of wanting to push ahead with something

avidness.gloss: a positive feeling of wanting to push ahead with something

avitaminosis.gloss: any of several diseases caused by deficiency of one or more vitamins

avocado tree.gloss: tropical American tree bearing large pulpy green fruits

avogadro.gloss: Italian physicist noted for his work on gases

avogadro's hypothesis.gloss: the principle that equal volumes of all gases (given the same temperature and pressure) contain equal numbers of molecules

avogadro's law.gloss: the principle that equal volumes of all gases (given the same temperature and pressure) contain equal numbers of molecules

avogadro's number.gloss: the number of molecules in a mole of a substance (approximately 602,250,000,000,000,000,000,000)

avogadro number.gloss: the number of molecules in a mole of a substance (approximately 602,250,000,000,000,000,000,000)

avoirdupois.gloss: a system of weights based on the 16-ounce pound (or 7,000 grains)

avoirdupois weight.gloss: a system of weights based on the 16-ounce pound (or 7,000 grains)

avon.gloss: a river in southwestern England rising in Gloucestershire and flowing through Bristol to empty into the estuary of the Severn

avowal.gloss: a statement asserting the existence or the truth of something

avower.gloss: someone who claims to speak the truth

avalanche.gloss: gather into a huge mass and roll down a mountain, of snow

avenge.gloss: take revenge for a perceived wrong

avoid.gloss: refrain from certain foods or beverages

avaricious.gloss: immoderately desirous of acquiring e.g. wealth
